website_summaries.verdict: The OLEDC7P series of OLED TVs continues LG's trend of offering superb picture quality in a gorgeous, minimal design. But you'll pay handsomely for it.
pros: Fantastic picture, with perfect black levels and wide, accurate colors

customer_reviews.title: Random screen burn after 13 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this TV. It did everything I wanted and more. Unfortunately after 13 months there is a line of screen burn running along the bottom of the screen. I cannot match it to any news tickers on sky news or BBC news, so they cannot be the cause; and I also don't play games on the TV, or have anything attached that could cause the screen burn. This probably won't help anyone as there are newer models of this TV out there, but screen burn seems to be a big problem with OLED TV's, and if I'd known that at the time I would not have bought this TV
customer_reviews.author: B Smith

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my existing LG 3D tv to this model. Picture is simply stunning. Very easy to install and setup. Like the built in WiFi and Amazon button on the remote. With 4K media or UHD 4K streaming the picture takes your breath away. Blue plant 2 makes you feel really immersed in the experience. Highest quality construction with an alloy cast and machined stand rather than plastic. The six nations rugby looks amazing. Can’t recommend this TV highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing T.V. Incredible picture
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing T.V. Watching this t.v. is just like looking through a window. So clear and that’s just in 3K can’t wait to view in 4K. The detail is incredible, the sharpness of the colour is outstanding, no ghosting when watching high speed sports. Lightweight, looks smaller than our previously smaller screened t.v. because there isn’t a large frame around the screen. Looks stunning, really pleased. Quick delivery, great service, A++++
customer_reviews.author: Alistair

customer_reviews.title: Avoid LG Oled TVs
customer_reviews.text: After 18 months this TV developed a terrible screen burn just from normal viewing. LG will not tell you this and push the message that screen burn is impossible. Look at the green line in the photos. That is what a screen burn looks like, and you have just wasted £1000s. I have been mugged by a Korean, because LG will not help you even if you have a warranty because they will accuse you of wilful damage. So, the message is do not buy LG Oled TVs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Davison

customer_reviews.title: Picture and sound perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. The best TV picture I have ever experienced, some complain about the sound quality, but I have not experienced anything other than good sound reproduction. It’s LG and I received what I paid for, expensive but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. W. A. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Had this TV for a few weeks now, so far really happy with the quality of this TV, 1080p content usually looks just as good as 4K, brightness is good and the TV doesn't feel too big while watching it just from a few meters away. Apps on the TV are also good, I also have a Fire TV but now only use it to watch Crunchyroll, all other apps I need are already on this TV.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic immersive images.
customer_reviews.text: Like: picture is fabulous, sound is fabulous, features are wonderous. Dislike: It developed a dead pixel after a month but LG are sending a repair man without fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Great interface and love the point and click remote
customer_reviews.text: Stunning picture but slightly flaky software (eg lost all the HD channels so had to rescan). Great interface and love the point and click remote.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel E. Paine

customer_reviews.title: Best television I've seen for £1200
customer_reviews.text: First class television. Excellent all round experience: deep and rich colours, sharp as a diamond and beautifully balanced colours. Easy to set up and navigate control system. This tv punches above its weight and delivers great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. W. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Wow....
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW. Picture quality is unbelievable, you can see every detail. Easy to install, and set up. I can't give this any more praise. BRILLIANT.
customer_reviews.author: julie lattimer

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Great TV and great service from reliant. Easy TV to set up and use, great sound even before connecting my surround sound to it. Apps load fast and run without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Oled TV, 55". It was upgraded from the model shown, as the seller had made a mistake. There were no quibbles. Arrived ontime, with a call beforehand to confirm arrival. Instructions easy to follow right-out-of-the-box.
customer_reviews.author: barry m

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: Loved this TV so much that I returned it to get the 65 incher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picture is great. No problems so far
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in one piece. Picture is great. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: MR SS BUTTOO

customer_reviews.title: Good picture
customer_reviews.text: It's so thin and the picture is great. It comes with a decent range of apps although comparing it to an LED 1080 Samsung the picture was not as bright
customer_reviews.author: apples

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Had it a few years now.. still excellent television. but remote broke and the replacement is very expensive..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV - stunning picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Great TV and very user friendly. Only, the WIFI speed could be better (have some issues with HD content streaming). Pictures are stunning !
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good quality very happy with performance, operating instructions poor and takes two people to handle installation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, noticeable better than the rest. Good service and prompt delivery
customer_reviews.author: alfie apps

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - faulty
customer_reviews.text: Switched itself off after 2 years and won't go back on. Amazon don't want to know and LG don't want to know !!!
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant TV at a good price, piece of cake to set up,,amazing contact with seller, couldn't have been more helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Would like guarantee
customer_reviews.text: No problems at moment only issue phoned for guarantee which must have been attached to packaging but still not received gurantee
customer_reviews.author: Mrs morag watt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the TV, the colours are amazing. Great customer service too
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Watching Blu Ray Star Wars last night was life changing with this TV. I was borderline emotional.
customer_reviews.author: STC

customer_reviews.title: After having this for 6 months now i've noticed a ...
customer_reviews.text: After having this for 6 months now i've noticed a rectangle box burnt on the screen which i haven't kept the tv on static for long periods of time to get burnt in issues, which after researching the net i have found out it is a LG defect. After spending quite alot of money on this set i didnt expect after 6 months they would be issies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Users Manual
customer_reviews.text: No User Manual or external device setup manual was included in the delivery. Have spent some considerable time trying to find these manuals. For some reason I can not gain access to read the Users Guide after down loading it. I managed to down load and print a copy of the External component Setup. Why do these important manuals not come with the TV? Needless to say I have not got the TV working so do not know what the picture or sound quality is like. As for ease of installation ???????????? Wasted a considerable amount of my time trying to locate these manuals - frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: George Rodaks

customer_reviews.title: Great Home Television
customer_reviews.text: This is the best picture I have seen so far on a home tv great fantastic excellent.
customer_reviews.author: David Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product with an A***** service, great company to deal with, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing image quality
customer_reviews.text: Cracking TV. Amazing image quality. Item as described. Delivered promptly. No issues. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: alan latham

customer_reviews.title: Sensational
customer_reviews.text: An amazing 4K TV, so pleased I spent the extra and got this one!
customer_reviews.author: Simon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but a fantastic quality screen
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but a fantastic quality screen. The colours are amazing and setting up the TV is very easy. Takes some getting used to with some of the important settings hidden away in various menus but once its set up its a gorgeous looking piece of kit. I have some concerns about burn in but will have to see how that goes, mainly using it for watching films and shows rather than gaming so it shouldn't be much of a risk factor anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even my wife thinks it's money well spent, which is a first!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I read about this TV having a stunning picture is true. The up-scaling of a 1080p broadcast must be seen to be believed. Hated the Magic Controller at first, but now I've got used to it it's not too bad. Interestingly the controller from our old LG 47" LED TV also works with this TV, which makes the setting up much easier. Could not be more happy.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV. to get the most out of it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic TV. to get the most out of it you need to be able to watch HD or 4K program's. Anything in HD such as Blue Planet or Nat Geo HD look stunning. Also upgraded my Netflix to get HD/4K and it was worth the extra £3.00 / month. Amazon Prime in 4K such as The Grand Tour look fantastic. Its not cheap but you will be glad you bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. M. Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV, usefull tips
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV, useful tips: unboxing and installing it is very difficult to do it alone, but not impossible, if you are getting problems with HDR make sure that HDMI Ultra HD option is on (tv general settings)
customer_reviews.author: Salvador G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: I cant even start to describe how much i love this TV. The Only issue Ive found is with he sound as it is not that great, but if you have . nice audio setup you are going to be me fine
customer_reviews.author: Ivaylo Boicov Ivanchev

customer_reviews.title: HD/4kUHD ready.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as the platform for watching Blu-ray and 4kUHD DVD's (which need the HDR capability) and for this it is brilliant. For television viewing it needs an HD channel/input as 'normal' channels look a little grainy; older programs made in the USA look a little fuzzy but this should be expected when remembering what the American TV/video infrastructure was like in the 80s/90s.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Grandad

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this TV there are problems with the sreecn
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: great at first
customer_reviews.text: then it blows up after 14 months will never buy LG again
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: The best TV for 2018
customer_reviews.text: Simply an amazing TV. I've had a Panasonic Plasma and have resisted an LCD TV as I find the Plasma so much richer and more life-like than any LCD TVs I've seen. This LG OLED is really a step above - delivering amazingly clear and deep images, with much better brightness than my old Plasma. The TV menus are more of a faff but are still much better than most other manufacturers' clunky and over-complicated TV menus nowadays (looking at you in particular, Sony). Can't recommend this TV enough - brilliant picture, all the necessary connections, and looks great in the living room with almost borderless frame.
customer_reviews.author: kinggx

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity issues are an outrage
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture and sound. Major problem with it is that they make it impossible to connect to wirelessly stream from other devices - they want you to buy an LG phone as well. For which they can seriously go and fudge themselves. I paid four grand for this last year and my 800 quid telly connects to everything. Grrr.
customer_reviews.author: Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Useless for dark scenes in films/TV shows/games
customer_reviews.text: I thought this TV being OLED would be great for dimly lit scenes. However, it is terrible. It’s next to impossible to see anything happening in games/TV shows/films when they are low lit, without boosting the brightness do high it ruins the picture. I feel very stupid for paying so much money for a TV that is only good half the time. Forget the reviews, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Incredible picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this model from Richer Sounds last year for around £1900. Very pleased with it. One thing I will mention is that the screen is so incredibly thin that I feared breaking it while affixing a wall mount bracket. Lowering it down flat and back up again I would recommend three people and lots of communication! We use it every day and it does not let us down.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cunnington

customer_reviews.title: Breathtaking
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this as a wedding present, and it is simply breathtaking. I dont have anything that is 4K so I upgraded my Netflix to be 4K and even streaming, it is absolutely insane to look at. The remote is great, the software is great... But its all about the picture quality which is simply stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2017 screen fault
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for me I purchased a 2017 Oled55B7V. First impressions were great, loved it for about 18 months then a started to see the 'Burn-In' fault start to take effect. I was not pleased at all, you don't expect to spend 1500 quid on an OLED for it to be faulty. LG have said i woulf have to pay for the repair of the LG fault to fix it. Not good from LG.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon D.

customer_reviews.title: Great OLED with easy to use interface and great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Great OLED with easy to use interface (with all the apps I need) and great picture quality (especially when I an find some good 4K content!)
customer_reviews.author: C. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: SCREEN DOES NOT EVEN TURN ON AND WARRANTY PROCESS REALLY SLOW
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! The TV lasted less than a year and the customer service at LG have being really slow and awful! The TV has being broken down for at least a month and has not even being repaired by LG!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Koshy

customer_reviews.title: ... have said the picture on this tv is staggeringly good. I had a 4 year old 4K set ...
customer_reviews.text: As many people have said the picture on this tv is staggeringly good. I had a 4 year old 4K set but it does not come close to this one in terms of definition.If you want to see something truly spectacular that fully justifies my comments catch The Blue Planet in UHD on BBC I Player (which is included as an app on the set) while it is still available. Wow!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: The picture will just blow you away it's so so so good. I would say buy a sound bar but ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're planning on buying a tv don't spend a grand on cheaper 4K TVs, bite the bullet spend a bit more, BUY THIS!!!!. This is worth 3k originally and at half that price stands up still to sonys top spec TVs that cost over 3k and even 4K. The picture will just blow you away it's so so so good. I would say buy a sound bar but honestly the picture is so good it's just not worth wasting your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gray

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly brilliant for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV. The first time we’ve splashed out this sort of money for a telly, and we’re loving it. 4K HDR looks amazing - but other stuff seems to look way better too. The sound is brilliant and the magic remote is the best I’ve used. If you want the best telly out there this will do the job. Much better than anything else we’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Impressive piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: I have no regrets after purchasing this screen. The picture quality is outstanding and the system software is very slick. It isn’t mentioned much in reviews, but you can connect a USB thumb stick or external HDD and then record programmes from the tuner. The remote control and user interface are also first class.
customer_reviews.author: ModeSeven

customer_reviews.title: Shame about the remote
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about the tv itself, it's phenomenal. The remote on the other hand doesn't feel premium, it's cheap and plasticy, creaks while being used, and there's no lights on the buttons for viewing in the dark, in fact it's the same magic remote I got with a cheaper 40" led model.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J W B Mclaren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome OLED TV
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this OLED 4K 65 inch TV. Linked to my Yamaha AVR unit, this TV is awesome. The picture is incredible with great intuitive logic in terms of set up and general use. 4k Bluray films like Planet of the Apes show off the capability of this TV. 65 inch fitted to the wall has that wow factor even switched off but it backs it up with pure amazing picture performance. No wonder this TV has just won the 2017 What Hifi Best TV award!!!
customer_reviews.author: Louis O

customer_reviews.title: Was a good Tv, shame it broke so quickly
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these locally on the 18th Oct 2017, 6 weeks later it has broken! White line down the screen and trouble turning on so took it back and opted for a Panasonic instead. Was a good Tv, shame it broke so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Scott-Renouf

customer_reviews.title: Sold the wife for this
customer_reviews.text: I just sent back the LG sj850 A’s it had a line going up the screen and had to Sell the wife to get this TV But we’ll worth it and on the upside it doesn’t Nag Every five minutes
customer_reviews.author: TEL

customer_reviews.title: The Devil and the Deep Deep Blue
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I sold my soul to own this TV. But alas, that wasn't enough, so I sold the house too. So what I now do, is wander into the local store (well it is cold now I'm out on the streets), telling everyone that cares to listen "I own one of those". The picture quality, when I get to see it, is to die for. At which point, one of those I was bragging to then politely informed me that they were in fact the devil, and worse still, they now owned me. So, to die for I did. The end.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Sold both kidneys to afford this TV. I don't have long left, but I get to watch this unmissable picture quality!
customer_reviews.author: John Duffy

customer_reviews.title: seemed like a good place to start
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a spare kidney, seemed like a good place to start.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sold my corneas to buy this TV. Family are happy
customer_reviews.author: skiphire55

customer_reviews.title: I would happily sell one of my kidneys to Carthge Duffy if ...
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get funds to buy this tv, saw it in a shop and picture quality is out of this world. I would happily sell one of my kidneys to Carthge Duffy if needed.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: Was gona get this tv, but I bought some kidneys instead!
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Iv just sold my kidneys, a lung and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Iv just sold my kidneys, a lung and my pancreas so hopefully will be able to purchase This incredible tv, just had a demo at a local store it's out of this world
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

customer_reviews.title: Never by LG ever again.
customer_reviews.text: Almost £1500 and it broke down in less than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: p.Sparrowhawk

product_meta.title: LG OLED65B7V 65 inch Premium 4K Ultra HD HDR Smart OLED TV (2017 Model)
product_meta.description:
Size Name:65 inch

This LG OLED B7 TV 4K comes with Dolby Atmos sound, multi HDR 4K with Dolby Vision plus a high quality sweeping premium crescent stand to complete a ultra-premium audio/visual package.

Organic self-emitting pixels not only deliver picture reproduction of unprecedented contrast, colour and clarity - but due to their unique nature - the design of LG OLED TV is revolutionary, elegant and highly thin. With an incredible blade slim design this LG OLED TV adds class to any room.

Striking picture quality and jaw dropping design are further enhanced with a distinctive and Dolby Atmos implementation - the first of its kind - bringing to your home the cinematic technologies from Dolby - Vision and Atmos.

See and hear the spectacular, immersing you in entertainment, movies and sports like never before in the home. An audio visual experience that will redefine the way you think about TV forever. OLED TV like no other.



BOX CONTAINS


1 x LG OLED65B7V 65-inch 4K ultra HD HDR smart LED TV, remote control, 2 x AAA batteries, power cable, screws, welcome guide booklet for smart TV setup
feature_bullets: Black; dive deeper into the darkness with LG OLED TV: Organic self emitting pixels achieve the deepest levels of black due to their unique ability to completely switch off - no light is emitted or passing through the pixel

Ideal colour; colour and contrast perfection: OLED pixels create an astonishingly accurate and wide colour range which is presented on the perfect black background only available from self emitting pixels

Dolby vision; Dolby vision transforms your TV viewing experience with astonishing brightness, contrast and colour: With image enhancement and scene by scene optimisation you will see there is more to the HDR story with Dolby vision

Dolby atmos sound; the next step in audio immersion: A world first implementation specifically designed for LG OLED TVs, Dolby atmos moves in three-dimensional space, allowing for a more realistic recreation of audio entertainment
Blade slim; the television screen is bonded to a single metal sheet for a stunning, razor thin design: With an ultra slim and elegant finish this TV is unlike anything you have seen before
Stand dimensions (width x depth) - 800 x 282 mm and vesa dimensions - 300 x 200 mm
